comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This photo seems to be later due to the 1890 Metropole Hotel,  not seen in the Henry King photo.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic provides a better view of the Mercantile Rowing Club boat shed and clubhouse, etc ...see comments re the MRC's premises at the PHM version (ie. Pelle's thumbnail above). I love the way how so many of these old pics provide us with warts and all views...or at least views which include occasional warts...here we get a fantastic foreground view of a somewhat unruly vacant lot...then there's a lawnmower hard at work in the paddock beside the MRC clubhouse...beautiful!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: Hi folks - thanks for all your comments & additional information. It is great to see similar images from other collections. And being able to narrow the date down to a few years is fantastically helpful! Thanks again!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
